newsitem.title: USA: Manhattan Bagel names Falcone CFO.
newsitem.headline: Manhattan Bagel names Falcone CFO.

text.p: Manhattan Bagel Co Inc said on Tuesday it has appointed retail financial and operations executive Richard Falcone as chief financial officer.

Falcone was previously chief operating officer of National Merchants Management corp, a book retailer and distributor, and had served as chief financial officer of Bed Bath & Beyond Inc from March 1990 through September 1994.

Falcone, who will join the company on January 6, 1997, will replace Leonard Johnson, who will be returning to the Arby's franchise network. The specific nature of the job was not immediately available.
Manhattan Bagel said Johnson was previously chief financial officer at Arby's Inc before he joined the company.
